website_summaries.verdict: It works, but there is nothing spectacular about the ExcelSteel. You should opt for T-fal or Faberware's - either is a better choice.
pros: Easy to use and cleans up well
Size is ideal to cook for one or two people or small groups
cons: Lightweight to the point of being flimsy
Handles heat up and the unit becomes hard to handle

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer with updates
customer_reviews.text: I've used these pots at least 2 dozen times now since I purchased them a few months back and they still look brand new. Some of the reviews mention the pots start to corrode or the handles loosen up, but I haven't had that issue. They are easy to clean, light weight and the price is very competitive compared to other similar items on the market. 8/2/19 update - I’m still using these on a daily basis and they practically look brand new still. Of course I’ve been giving them a good wash each time but I couldn’t be more happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: ... double boiler because I was looking for a model like this in stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this double boiler because I was looking for a model like this in stainless steel. It most definitely is NOT stainless steel. It is a thin cheap metal. In the heating process it turns white sauces into grey. It forms a black thick almost like rust when you heat things. I do not recommend it and it should not be listed as stainless steel. Very cheaply manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: H.G.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Made out of very thin steel. Like, sheet metal thin. It's so thin that when my husband turned off the heat, the contraction of the water vapor in the lower vessel was able to exert enough vacuum force to suck the top part in. The handle, which is spot welded on, broke off as we were attempting to separate them. I had to heat it up on a camp stove to separate them so I could throw it in the recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: josefski

customer_reviews.title: A quality double boiler for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this double pot boiler to make CBD oil with. The final product is a sticky gooey substance when boiled down. I have used the pot several times and never had a problem cleaning the pot afterwards. I'm very happy with the quality of this product, especially for how low the price is.
customer_reviews.author: GTSTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish I never bought these pand. They are so thin and light, food burns easily through them and pan turns a metallic blue.... health concern? Don't be fooled by The weight of the package, its the glass lid that is actually very nice.
customer_reviews.author: nicolaus grauer

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use.
customer_reviews.text: The handle came off midway thru first use. I wasn't able to lift the top pan off the boiling water. Not only was it defective but dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Every cook needs one.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and turned out to be the perfect gift. My niece had asked if I had a double boiler so she could melt chocolate Co reed peanut butter balls. I have my mom’s but I keep it in storage until I need it. I have a micro kitchen with micro cabinets. I bought this and gave it to her Christmas Eve. If the peanut butter and cherry nugget candies are any indication of quality thi double boiler is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Moberly

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low cost quality. U get what u pay for. My regular double boiler s copper base with a ceramic insert and copper cover. This will be used only when we need 2 boilers. Have only used it once, and u have to be attentive, as is not at all forgiving like my regular is.
customer_reviews.author: ERNIE C.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I suppose that's not the seller's or manufacturer's fault, I should have gotten out a ruler and looked carefully at the dimensions, but it's the size of a small fondue pot. I live alone, so it will work for me, but it would be undersized for a family of four, unless you're talking about Hollandaise sauce for Eggs Benedict on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, lightweight, sturdy, great size for candy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use together or separately. Light weight. There is a ridge near the middle which I wish was solid and smooth on the inside. Also handle could have a coating or skip on heat protector for easier handling. Over all I am very happy with this purchase and I use it to make gummy bears!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja m.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, very light weight item
customer_reviews.text: It works, but that's about it. This is hardly something that will impress you as a solid, quality piece of cookware. Very thin metal makes heat control difficult and the handle can get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Martha's Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: Great double boiler
customer_reviews.text: This 3 piece unit is great! The tempered glass lid fits on both pans! They are lighter weight stainless steel but that is what I wanted. I can't lift heavy pans due to a bad wrist injury. But nothing "light duty" about this double boiler! Well made, well packaged, fast delivery. I have melted chocolate for cookies and brownies, and made Clotted Cream for my homemade Scones! Perfect!! Highly recommend this unit, works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Moonminx

customer_reviews.title: Affordable. Meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is not too heavy. The bottom pan looks thick and sturdy the top boiler part looks lightweight... over all looks classy. I havent tried using it. I just need an affordable double boiler. Im planning to use it for making butter cream frostings.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.C

customer_reviews.title: It works quite well just thin material
customer_reviews.text: Product is made of stamped stainless will work on an induction range but it is I don't know 16 gauge as such the boiler pan slightly warps and pumps While heating as well of course as not having a thick bottom it will not retain heat consistency But it is what it is for an entry-level Gizmo it's pretty good
customer_reviews.author: adamerickson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and that it's stainless steel, however very tinny and hard to clean the water mark's left on the pan. It served it purpose and will keep it but will never buy another one. You get what you pay for. I like heavier stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the shipping time
customer_reviews.text: This double boiler is great. Low price, excellent quality for the price. Cleans easy, dishwasher safe. I use it to make gummy bears. This is a mess when it comes time to clean. But these clean up easier than my teflon pots in this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Liqrisquicker

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.text: I've already burned myself using this. The steam comes out from almost all sides, impossible to avoid. It is very light, so light that the bottom burner already has black marks. This probably wont last very long. I honestly would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Katsme-ow

customer_reviews.title: My opinion on this pot
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a great pot for a double boiler and that is what I wanted. If I tried to cook with the bottom pot I think the food would burn easily. I only intend to use it as a double boiler.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DeRouen

customer_reviews.title: A little thin on the thickness of the metal, but still acceptable. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these growing up. I mainly use it for velveeta cheese blocks. It works great. Once the cheese is melted along with the Rotel sauce you can pull it of stove and leave the pots together and the hot water keeps the cheese melted for about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Henna essential
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for cooking and using henna and it worked perfectly. It is a little flimsy, but you can't beat the price. Update 4/2/18: I did notice there is now discoloration on the bottom of the pot, but again, not a deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyCash

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised
customer_reviews.text: Price was right - I prefer stainless... WIsh the pot were a little more substantial - the material of constuction is rather thin and flimsy, but functional. I will continue to look for a replacement, a higher end product, but very happy with this interim step while I find the ideal product
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great for herbal infusion oil making!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reliable not to expensive double boiler and I really like this one so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: She looks for any reason to use these pans. Haha. She loves them, and that makes me love them. Easy to use, pretty sturdy. I'm sure they would ding easy if you tried to smash them, but just like anything else, if you take care of them they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McLelland

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This pan was so thin. Also, I though I coukd cut myself on the handle. Amazon emailed me for a review so here it is. Not blaming Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself for making sauces and chocolate cookies and candies. It does what it needs to do however it is a little too much on the light weight side
customer_reviews.author: Ann Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, which was nice. I haven’t used it yet, but there was a big dent on the bottom side of the pot right out of the box. Bummer. It was packaged fine and there were no dents in the box, so it must have been put in the box damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The pan rusted after first use, water was only in it to boil and then to cool. When cooled I dumped it and the sides had rust spots. Waste of money especially for someone on a budget that needed this for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Migitry

customer_reviews.title: sit well on top of the boiler
customer_reviews.text: it is light weight and roomy. I could cook enough mashed potatoes for 8 to ten people easily. easy to store. worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One time use
customer_reviews.text: Melted my chocolate perfectly and made really tasty candy. One use pot though, stuck together and can't separate. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna McCormick

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: It's great for the price. Nothing special. Melts chocolate like I want it too without burning/scorching it.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and after cleaning it I noticed little tiny rust spots. I thought I was buying stainless steel..? Also it says it has stay cool handles..They're not. The pans are very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. This product is great for my project. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LaFemmeNiaB💋

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. If you need a double boiler for tiramisu, you need this!
customer_reviews.author: kathijo

customer_reviews.title: Melting Chocolate just got easier!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this light weight but well constructed pan while making candy. I have arthritis and heavy pans are hard to handle. This one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Akasha R. Babos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for this kind of product this one is excellent. It heats up readily and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy cheap material. Luckily it’s okay for making lotions which is what I’m using it for. I would not be happy if I purchased this for food grade purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love my double boiler. I use for making diy lotions, deodorant etc
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: Parts tend to stick together and are difficult to separate when hot.
customer_reviews.author: thomas bolia

customer_reviews.title: I had to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't seperate the two pieces so that I could refill the water, so the pan ended up burning and had to get thrown away. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good  lightweight quality
customer_reviews.text: It is really lightweight. I was expecting heavier but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: WildwomanAja

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make homemade pudding. Worked perfectly. Great price. Cleaned easily.
customer_reviews.author: waynenorwoodjr

customer_reviews.title: Great Double Boiler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Double Boiler. I finally got brave enough to attempt my Mother's Banana Pudding recipe and this double boiler was perfect for the job and didn't cost me a fortune since I won't be using it that often. I highly recommend this for anyone that ever needs to double boil. It's not too big, so it is easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: CatalogDiva

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The metal is very thin. Guess it's what I should expect from the price. Still does the job that a double boiler should though. I've only used once so far so I do not know yet how they hold up over a little time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Murphy

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It's of good quality, good value and a s described.
customer_reviews.author: N. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to clean and light weight. It's really good for what I use it for and I am loving the price
customer_reviews.author: Haneef R Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for melting chocolate for my zucchini chocolate bread.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Menius

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for the home cook. Works great. Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.author: LadyJMB

customer_reviews.title: Sorry pot
customer_reviews.text: Pots stuck together and could NOT be separated had to discard very disappointed and the stainless steel was very thin
customer_reviews.author: lurana shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Pies
customer_reviews.text: I love my double boiler. I can make homemade pie filling. Now, I can go back to making homemade pies. Like, I use to.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great double boiler
customer_reviews.text: This is the quality I expect from Amazon products. Good double boiler.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nor recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a much flimsier product than I was expecting, and after a few uses, the bottom of the bottom portion has already discolored. It is substandard stainless steel and I would neither purchase it again, nor recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shazzie J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pots!
customer_reviews.text: I should've invested in these pots sooner. Great for melting chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: NOT HEAVY ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I PREFER GLASS BUT I won't COMPLAIN IT IS FOR HOLIDAY COOKING
customer_reviews.author: nycee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this product is sufficient. It feels a little more lightweight than some other pots I've owned, but I don't intend to use it more than once a month, so it wasn't necessary to invest in a sturdier pot. In no way to I think this product is flimsy, however.
customer_reviews.author: kpaige

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my sister. She was delighted with it. She loves everything about it..
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: affordable
customer_reviews.text: this is affordable and works very well. I only use it for my salve making so don't expect heavy use
customer_reviews.author: Katie1554

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR MELTING CHOCOLATE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR MELTING CHOCOLATE, BUTTER AND MUCH MORE. THE FOOD DOESN'T BURN AND IT'S JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR SMALL THINGS.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: Pans
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this product. The first time I used it the bottom pan burned. It will take an sos pad to get it off. The pans are so thin you really have to watch how you use them. They are from China.
customer_reviews.author: WOM

customer_reviews.title: ... these yet but they came as expected and look good
customer_reviews.text: i havent had time to use these yet but they came as expected and look good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that everything fits together well. They look good on the stove. They serve their purpose really well.
customer_reviews.author: laffytaffy77541

customer_reviews.title: Double boiler boils me over
customer_reviews.text: Good double boiler does the job now I can make soap without making a mess
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Would not recommend it for cosmetic formulation as it is too thin, easily scratches and stains even if you wash it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen L Herrero

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use with the "cheese wax" It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: TonyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. I'm sure I don't have it anymore though I used it alot. Things tent to getvloat when you move alot.
customer_reviews.author: JSlig

customer_reviews.title: Very nice double boiler
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight pans, which can be a good thing. Glad to have a pan that I can use when ever I want to make sure I don't have burning or scorching. Smaller pan that is perfect for one or two people or when huge quantity is not needed. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flat.
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of the boiler is flat bottomed. Not very helpful if making something that requires abundant whisking. This works great for fondue. Also, there is a recessed portion of the upper boiler that makes cleaning difficult. It's also low-quality metal, one drop and it will get dented very easily.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Handle can cut you hand
customer_reviews.text: Sharp handle can cut your hand. I have to return it as it is made of very light material and the handle has an unfinished edge which is a hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. Unfortunately it was much smaller than I had anticipated however I will be checking to see if they carry the same on in a larger set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend more money
customer_reviews.text: Crap pans. CHEAP cheap metal. Be careful, I worry about burning the content of the top boiler...
customer_reviews.author: psckmorris

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in original thin box. Barely any tape used on it. Box and pot was damaged. Surprised at the poor shipping prep. See pics
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. I finally got around to using the product during holiday season and there is a hole in it. The return window has closed so I’m stuck with a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pot was good and the RSVP pot was not as good and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry I put my review for this pan on the place for the RSVP pot. This pot was good and the RSVP pot was not as good and it did not work on my induction stove. Please correct this for me as I would hate to mislead someone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taubman

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The lid fits either pot so you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The lid fits either pot so you can use them separately too. They are also very lightweight! I was honestly surprised at how light they were...they are still durable though!
customer_reviews.author: Moonjelly

customer_reviews.title: Not made very well
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and the pans got stuck together. The handles broke off when I was trying to pull them apart. There are tiny welds holding the handles on the pots
customer_reviews.author: Ryanne Rother

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: Well-made product. I have no issues with it. Good size, cleans easily, and is perfect for melting down shea and cocoa butters, among other things.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joseph Woods

customer_reviews.title: It’s dishwasher safe and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to make hollandaise sauce. It’s also great to melt chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: They love it is all I have heard
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. They love it is all I have heard.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't order again
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thin. Also the curves on the inside of the pot makes it difficult to stir melting cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Monnie

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: good, i bought to make oven baked banana pudding. they get the job done but turned a rust brown color. would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Miller

customer_reviews.title: double boiler was difficult to find
customer_reviews.text: I love the pot it has served its purpose and cleans up nicely, very easy to use, hard to find good pots

customer_reviews.title: the metal is pretty thin on the pots
customer_reviews.text: the metal is pretty thin on the pots, only had it for a short while, and its ended up with small rust marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great potd
customer_reviews.text: Great pot , light weight and great for the puddings I make

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the double boiler! It cooks vegetables beautifully! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Paula Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The gauge of this metal is so-o-o-o-o-o thin I worry ...
customer_reviews.text: The gauge of this metal is so-o-o-o-o-o thin I worry about its loosing its shape and not fitting together properly in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: The pans stuck together and exploded all over my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheese dip. Doesn't burn dip.
customer_reviews.text: Nice option for a budget double boiler. I use it mostly for velvetta and rotel dip. Doesn't burn like it might in a crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: LA Salt

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This item proves the theory that "you get what you pay for " the pans are so thin I believe a pot made of aluminum would be strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have infused many oils with herbs with this wonderful double boiler. It also makes creating skin care products very easy.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Simple, light, and functions exactly as you'd hope.
customer_reviews.text: Creates a firm seal to the bottom pot, and even though the handles are metal, they don't transfer enough heat to be noticeable when moving the pots.
customer_reviews.author: Caribou

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: We are using it for our bees wax so can't ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Kris C.

customer_reviews.title: My mom is a great cook and she recently moved and misplaced her double ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom is a great cook and she recently moved and misplaced her double boiler SOO I bought this for her and now I'm "SON OF THE YEAR"

customer_reviews.text: Very thin flimsy product. Very disappointed. Would not recommend or buy agsib

customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this a while back and it caught on fire yesterday and still works great. 10/10 what a survivor.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good product! I made a dessert buffet for a wedding.. hours of dipping chocolate and worked great!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the price. I bought for crafting so I have no clue how it works for food.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not the best but it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make homemade lotions and lip glosses. Quality is not the best but it serves its purpose, and is right for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I used this product exclusively for making soaps ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I used this product exclusively for making soaps and cosmetic products and it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I am not overly impressed with the boiler I purchased. I have never bought one of these before and assumed stainless steel would be of good quality. The pans are very light, I could be wrong but feel that they are not of the best quality. The other issue is a little lip at the bottom of the top pan where it fits into the bottom pan. It makes it difficult to get all the ingredients out because of this lid. I do not bake a lot so for the minimal use this pan will receive I can still use it. If you have a need for a double boiler I would look at other products, just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Rosie Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good for 150 or so hours
customer_reviews.text: It worked well and looked good for roughly 150 hours of boiling. Then the metal rim on the rim corroded. I switched to a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: it is still a good buy and deserves a 4
customer_reviews.text: Very thin... the bottom is heat burnt already after 4 times of use. Given the price, it is still a good buy and deserves a 4 star
customer_reviews.author: bunnylovebun

product_meta.title: ExcelSteel 3 Piece Boiler, 2.5 quart, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Made of highly polished stainless steel, this 2.5 Qtr. piece is the ideal kitchen tool for melting your favorite chocolate or cheese. Features stay cool handles with hanging loops and a see-through tempered glass lid allows you to monitor your cooking. The pans are also dishwasher safe and induction stovetop ready.
feature_bullets: Made of highly polished stainless steel
2.5 Qt. piece is the ideal kitchen tool for melting your favorite chocolate or cheese
Features stay cool handles with hanging loops
See-through tempered glass lid allows you to monitor your cooking whenever needed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,019 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
